Class GamePhaseHandler

java.lang.Object
org.com.Handlers.GamePhaseHandler
public class GamePhaseHandler extends Object
Handles the game phase and changes after each players turn.

  • Constructor Details

    • GamePhaseHandler

      public GamePhaseHandler()
      Constructor for GamePhaseHandler. Initializes the game phase to LoadMapPhase and sets up player list and advance commands buffer.
